description: The Order of the Templars of Sigmar, known as the Witch Hunters, is dedicated to the eradication of heretics, warlocks, witches, sorcerers, fortune-tellers, necromancers, worshippers of the dark gods, deviants, mutants, blasphemers, sinners, utterers of profanities, servants of Daemons, or composers of corrupting music... Indeed, there are few who altogether escape the suspicions of the Witch Hunters.
name: Witch Hunters
